snippet: This year, the remembrance was particularly poignant, culminating in months of preparation, exhibits and re-examination of a murderous conflict.
abstract: Europeans commemorate armistice of World War I, pausing for reflection on the 11th hour of the 11th day of the 11th month; remembrance is particularly poignant in light of the centenary of the beginning of the war, with many nations preparing extensive memorials, exhibitions and re-examinations of a conflict that claimed millions of lives and redefined modern conflict.
lead_paragraph: This year, the remembrance was particularly poignant, culminating in months of preparation, exhibits and re-examination of a murderous conflict.

headline.main: 100 Years After World War I Began, Europe Remembers Its End
headline.print_headline: 100 Years After World War I Began, Europe Remembers Its End
